a close up view of a bas relief sculpture depicting a man holding a bull's head. the man is wearing a brown belt around his waist, and he has a beard. he is facing to the left, and his right arm is extended towards the viewer. the man's head is turned towards the viewer, and he is looking at it. the man's left hand is extended towards the viewer, and he is holding a sword in his right hand. the woman on the right side of the image is wearing a brown dress with a white sash around her waist. she is facing towards the viewer, and her left hand is extended towards the viewer.

a close up view of a group of ancient roman statues. the statues are made out of stone and are carved into the wall. the statues are facing each other and are looking at the viewer. one statue is holding a staff in his right hand and is wearing a blue robe. another statue is holding a staff in his left hand and is wearing a blue robe. the statues are placed on a white marble surface.

a detailed close-up captures a wall painting from the 4th century ad, depicting a group of men and women in a jubilant pose. the figures are painted in a variety of colors, including red, yellow, and white, with some wearing black or brown hats. the mural is set against a backdrop of a gray wall, adorned with cracks and scratches.

a close up view of a large stone pillar with a relief of a man riding a horse and two women standing next to it. the relief is carved into the stone in a 3d style. the stone pillar is on a brown brick base that is surrounded by a green lawn. behind the pillar are several buildings with trees and a blue sky with white clouds above them.

a close-up view of a stone pillar with carvings on it. the carvings are of people and animals, with the top of the pillar being carved into a horse's head. the carvings are in relief, with the words "imperii" written in latin letters on the left side of the pillar. the pillar is surrounded by green trees and a brown building in the background.
